NOTIFICATIONS 
Rawalpindi, the 11th April, 1982 
(I)182.—In exercise of the powers conferred by section 8 of 
ribunals Act, 1973 (LXX of 1973), the Federal Government is 
to direct that the following amendments shall be made in the Service 
(Qualifications of Members) Rules, 1974, namely :— 
In the aforesaid Rules, in rule 2,— 
after the words "period of ", the commas and words "or for periods 
aggregating ", shall be inserted: and 
the following Explanation shall be added at the end, namely 
"Explanation—In computing the period during which a person 
has held an appointment or post or has been an advocate or 
legal practitioner, there shall be included any period during 
which he has held an appointment or post after he became an 
advocate or legal practitioner or, as the case may be, the period 
during which he has been an advocate or legal practitioner after 
having held the appointment or post ". 
1/6/82-ST/D-4.]

The notice referred to in sub-rule (2) shall specify tht

A notice of the dates on which the Court is likely to

In determination of a question taken up by the Court 
under this rule, the provisions relating to disposal of a petition 
shall, mutatis mutandis, apply.".
